body_html:
What is the status of this issue? Is it supposed to work under PyTorch 0.3? I have a similar use case and in the beginning, it seems to work fine using autograd.grad inside backward, but after a while I get various C++ errors, e.g.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::out_of_range'
  what():  vector::_M_range_check

or just Segmentation Fault.
As far as I can tell, this only happens in cuda-mode, cpu-mode appear to be fine. Also, the time until these errors occur appears to be completely random.

body:
What is the status of this issue? Is it supposed to work under PyTorch 0.3? I have a similar use case and in the beginning, it seems to work fine using `autograd.grad` inside `backward`, but after a while I get various C++ errors, e.g.
```
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::out_of_range'
  what():  vector::_M_range_check
```
or just `Segmentation Fault`.
As far as I can tell, this only happens in cuda-mode, cpu-mode appear to be fine.  Also, the time until these errors occur appears to be completely random.
